Language Manager

Select your Pages from the list below. You can search for your Pages by entering the page name, filename or language in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Pages are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Pages. New Pages can be added by clicking the "Add New Page" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.
Image Manager
If you would like to include graphics on your pages -- they must be uploaded with the Image Manager. You can insert the uploaded graphics with the Page Editor.
Import Pages
All Pages in the "Import/PageSection" Folder will be imported to the following company.
Pages Imported Successfully

This Page Section can be displayed as a Custom Page in one of the following formats. Standard displays the standard header and navigation bar on the left. Wide displays the standard header with no navigation bar. Full displays no header, footer, or navigation bar. You can link to this page anywhere you can reference a URL link (another page section or a Promotion) as follows:
Page.asp?page=
PageWide.asp?page=
PageFull.asp?page=
Click the Browse button to select a web page (.htm file) from your personal computer. After you have selected the desired web page, click the Submit button to upload it to the system.
